推


[ 文宣組做野！] 已經迫死左三個人！我地要將新聞依位義士既心聲宣揚去國際！Reddit ! Twitter !
https://lih.kg/1272352
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

以下係英文caption:

A member of legislative council urged a frontline warrior not to break into the legislative council complex (building), as they may be charged for riot with ten years of sentence.

But the warrior replied: “I am ready to sacrifice! 3 of us have committed suicide!"


We want this to be heard globally:
1. The Brutal and reckless government of Carrie Lam has led three martyrs to commit suicide. They felt hopeless about HK’s future.
2. Frontline warriors have decided they are willing to die or go to prison for 10 years in order to defend for HK’s freedom and democracy.

弱智㗎？你覺得咁大個公民黨無pr管理Facebook
要楊岳橋佢地返屋企打上去？

二百萬人遊行完畢，但我哋連烈士個祭壇都保護唔到，我哋究竟贏咗啲咩？

血債不能票償，堅持四大訴求，不撤不散︰

1. 撤回《逃犯條例》修訂
2. 收回6‧12「暴動」定性
3. 撤銷有關所有控罪
4. 追究警隊濫權。
